data.text:
OVERVIEW OF THE COMPANY

Fox TV Stations

FOX Television Stations owns and operates 29 full power broadcast television stations in the U.S. These include stations located in 14 of the top 15 largest designated market areas, or DMAs, and duopolies in 11 DMAs, including the three largest DMAs (New York, Los Angeles and Chicago). Of these stations, 18 are affiliated with the FOX Network. In addition to distributing sports, entertainment and syndicated content, our television stations collectively produce approximately 1,200 hours of local news every week. These stations leverage viewer, distributor and advertiser demand for the FOX Network’s national content.

JOB DESCRIPTION

FOX 5 Atlanta is looking for an Executive Producer to spearhead the growth and development of our streaming news product. This is your chance to help us build a fast-growing distribution platform that connects us with a digital audience.

You’ll have all the resources of a major-market TV newsroom at your disposal as you lead a team of journalists with the freedom to innovate. If you enjoy storytelling with a passion, you’ll fit right in here. We need someone who knows news and who knows how to produce compelling video content that’s designed for the online viewer. Someone who can bring out the best in others, who is comfortable both in front of a camera and behind a keyboard. Someone who wants to innovate and find new ways to use technology to present news around the clock.

This job requires a unique combination of skills and offers the opportunity to work in a market-leading news organization. If the challenge of programming a live streaming news and information channel 24/7 excites you, we want to hear from you.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities

Plans and supervises production of streaming content, including daily news and other programming

Collaborates with other members of the digital team and news editorial managers to optimize the presentation of daily news coverage and breaking news coverage on the stream

Works with streaming producer/hosts to enhance the presentation of streaming content

Works with the Digital Content Director and other station managers to develop and implement strategies for expanding the scope and reach of the station’s streaming content and the FOX Local CTV app

Develops expertise in the technology used to produce and deliver streaming content in order to train staff in streaming systems and troubleshoot issues with the stream when required

Serves as producer/host of the station’s stream when required

Develops, implements and maintains standards of performance for streaming producer/hosts

Evaluates work performance of streaming producer/hosts

Performs other duties as assigned

Requirements

Outstanding leadership skills

Must possess strong language skills, be proficient in English grammar, spelling and punctuation and must be able to utilize conversational broadcast copy style efficiently under daily deadline pressure

Proficiency with video production technology, including non-linear editing and video switching tools

Strong editorial judgment required

Excellent on-camera delivery and communication skills required

A Bachelor’s degree from a four-year college or university in a related field preferred. Three years of experience in a newsroom at a commercial television station or digital news organization preferred

We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, gender identity, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable law.

At FOX, we foster a culture and environment where everyone feels welcome and can thrive. We are deeply committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion, including attracting, retaining, and promoting diverse talent across our company. We live in a diverse world, with different ideas and different perspectives that come together to spark new ideas and make great things happen. That means reflecting the diversity of the world around us is critical to our company’s success. We ensure that our viewers, communities and employees feel heard, represented, and celebrated both on screen and off.
